title: I'm quitting the game because of the Fiora rework
body:
I want you to all know why I'm quitting the game. 

I felt picked on for how good I was when they did the Fiora rework because they banned me from ranked.

Whoever gets banned from ranked?

They want to get rid of me and my Fiora.

So I guess I quit. 

And I know you guys will be like "good riddens!"

That's another reason why I'm  leaving. 

The community is so mean here with all it's down votes. 

It's a bunch of grumpy down voters who want to disagree with me about everything because they're bored.

replies.body:
Hey F3ORA,

I am going to lock up this thread. It doesn't contain much content about the game, and appears to be baiting your fellow players into arguments.

In the interest of making these boards a fun and useful place, we discourage this kind of posting. We are very happy for you to discuss frustrations with champion reworks, but we ask that those discussion focus on game content on this sub-board. 

If you have questions or comments about this action, you are welcome to come to our [Discord server](http://www.discord.gg/zjUGbwD). 

--KempyreanPirate
Gameplay Warden
You can quit the game fine just make sure you quit shitposting along with it. I am sure there is something you could be doing that isn't wasting time with this.

"They want to get rid of me and my fiora." lol. Somehow I don't think anybody is all that worried about you and your bronze 5 scrub ass fiora. 

And I'm sorry to say but the world doesn't revolve around you. I really don't think anybody is going to miss you. Nobody was out to get you, nobody was out to ban you or get you to quit, you are actually irrelevant. 

Seriously I probably am coming off as quite toxic here, but seek some serious mental help. If you've made up this entire community to love you and aspire to be you, and made changes to mess with your fiora play and get you kicked out of ranked, you should actually seek mental help.
League's community will surely suffer from a loss of such a valuable player. Have you thought your decision through? I dont think we will survive without someone like you :(

Lol how are we going to survive with one less fiora in the game. But seriously I think the reworked fiora is more healthy with team utility and ways to counter play. The old fiora was just press r to win if you have enough ad.
Pre level 6 you just QQ'd your way to victory
So league boards was part of old fiora's strategy?
It was and still is o3o
Riot is just a Fiora hater too or they'd of never changed her.
Kinda right, and kinda wrong.  Riot didn't like where Fiora was, so they moved her to a point where they liked her more.  It is kind of their job, after all.
However much you think riot fucked up fiora, look at your trash performance on her in bronze 5 and trust me you did her a whole lot worse.
Good riddens.
